resources.string:
Programming by Meilan Jin and Iliesa Delai under the supervision of Dr. Geoffrey Draper at Brigham Young University–Hawaii.

Justices' images and biographies adapted from Wikipedia and/or the official US Supreme Court website:
https://www.supremecourt.gov/about/members.aspx

This app is a research project funded by Brigham Young University–Hawaii; however, the contents are the responsibility of its developers. This app is not an official publication of the US Supreme Court nor of Brigham Young University–Hawaii.
Changes to the chart will be smoothly animated.
Chart will update immediately, without animation.
